# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
Apollo Server Support and Maintenance Renewal (or equivalent)

## Ref ID
SSC-24-00026896:T

## Amendment Number
Amendment 1

## Publication Date
2024-07-08

## Tender Closing Date
Tuesday, July 22nd at 11:00 a.m. (EST)

## Brief Description
The Shared Services Canada (SSC) seeks a vendor to provide Support and Maintenance for the Apollo Server for a period of 12 months, commencing on July 21, 2024, and ending on July 20, 2025. Vendors are required to submit bids through the SSC Public Procurement Portal (P2P) by the tenders closing date.

## Contract History
This tender is a renewal of the existing contract for Apollo Server Support and Maintenance. The closing date has been extended to 11:00 a.m. (EST) on Tuesday, July 22nd.

## Mandatory Conditions
* All bidders must register in the SSC P2P system to submit a response to the tender.
* Vendors must submit their bids through the P2P portal.
* After tender closing, the P2P system will not permit a bidder to submit a bid.

## Contact Information
For any questions or clarifications, please refer to the [Notice URL](link).

## Download the Tender
Please download the tender documentation from the following link: [BI90BDhttps://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/B4E05327-D749-4AEE-8678-F54D8E372F54[IDA]

## Contact the Government Representative
Refer to page 1 of the tender package for the contact information of the SSC Contracting Officer.
